Location: southern United States and Mediterranean area
Information: Anvirze is an aqueous extract of the plant Nerium oleander which has been utilized to treat patients with advanced malignancies.
Procedure:
Oleander has traditionally been used in the treatment of cardiac illness, asthma, diabetes mellitus, corns, scabies, cancer, and epilepsy.

However, its use should be approached with extreme caution. Ingesting any part of this plant can be fatal. 

It's best to consult with a qualified Ayurvedic practitioner for any herbal remedies or treatments.
